unnormalised: **Environmental News: Renewable Energy Soars in Rajasthan**
normalised: **Environmental News: Renewable Energy Soars in Rajasthan**

unnormalised: Namaste from Jaipur! Rajasthan, the land of the Rajputs, is charging ahead with renewable energy! Dr. Sharma from the MNRE (Ministry of New and Renewable Energy) announced a new solar park project near Jodhpur.
normalised: Namaste from Jaipur! Rajasthan, the land of the Rajputs, is charging ahead with renewable energy! Doctor Sharma from the M N R E (Ministry of New and Renewable Energy) announced a new solar park project near Jodhpur.

unnormalised: This ambitious project, sprawling across 5000 sq ft, is expected to generate enough clean electricity to power several villages. The initial investment is estimated at Rs. 200 Crores.
normalised: This ambitious project, sprawling across five thousand square feet, is expected to generate enough clean electricity to power several villages. The initial investment is estimated at rupee two hundred crore.

unnormalised: Experts believe this initiative will significantly reduce the state's reliance on coal-fired power plants, improving air quality and boosting local employment. The project aims to provide electricity to homes over 100 km away.
normalised: Experts believe this initiative will significantly reduce the state's reliance on coal-fired power plants, improving air quality and boosting local employment. The project aims to provide electricity to homes over one hundred kilometer away.

unnormalised: “This is a significant step towards a greener India,” said Ms. Devi, a local environmental activist. The state government is also offering subsidies to encourage residents to install rooftop solar panels. More updates as they come!
normalised: “This is a significant step towards a greener India,” said Missus Devi, a local environmental activist. The state government is also offering subsidies to encourage residents to install rooftop solar panels. More updates as they come!
